title: Roasted crown of grouse with pâté and red cabbage
description: Give game a go. In this recipe grouse crowns are roasted very quickly, served with braised red cabbage and homemade pâté.For this recipe you will need a food processor.
ingredients: 2 green apples, peeled, cored and chopped
125g/4½oz unsalted butter, cold, cut into cubes
4 slices white bread, cut into circles
4 grouse crowns, feet on, cleaned and gutted
